","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8l9v7","text":"Analyse whether there have been improvements in the transparency and reproducibility of economic assessment studies by comparing the GPCs containing them that have been produced in 2000-2012 vs 2013-2020.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
document: {"blocks":[{"key":"a5fo9","text":"Analysis of the reproducibility, transparency, and quality of economic studies on pharmacological interventions in health included in clinical practice guidelines in Spain 2000-2020","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":45},{"style":"bold","offset":46,"length":135}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44sm5","text":"","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fv1n0","text":"Análisis de la reproducibilidad, transparencia y calidad de los estudios económicos sobre intervenciones farmacológicas en salud empleados en las guías de práctica clínica en España en el periodo 2000-2020","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":205}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5tunn","text":"","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2pgi8","text":"Juan Ruano, Francisco Jose Gomez Garcia, Pedro J. Gómez Arias, Jesus Gay-Mimbrera, Macarena Aguilar-Luque, Esmeralda Parra-Peralbo, Beatriz Isla-Tejera","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crq5u","text":"","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rkjo","text":"","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frk06","text":"Review question(s) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hi79","text":"Are there differences in reproducibility, transparency, and methodological quality of economic studies of pharmacological interventions in health included in Spanish clinical practice guidelines published in Spain in the period 2000-2020? ","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kmos","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"42q66","text":"Types of study to be included ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0vn6","text":"Clinical Guidelines","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f33fm","text":"Health Economic Studies","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"finj5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7eqaq","text":"Condition or domain being studied ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7629p","text":"There is a growing interest in promoting transparency in scientific publications that allows research conducted to be reproducible by other research groups [1]. Economic assessments help determine the efficiency of health interventions and services, making it easier for both managers and healthcare professionals to make decisions under real clinical practice conditions [2]. To do this, it is necessary that, in addition to driving the studies according to the best methodological quality standards, both the data and methodological used and the results obtained are accessible to the scientific community, that is, communicated in the publications in a transparent and truthful way [3]. It has been observed that the quality with which this information is communicated in economic health studies in Spain is insufficient [4]. These authors consider that without the submission of comprehensive and transparent reports describing how these studies were designed and conducted, it is difficult to assess the validity of their results and conclusions. Recently, this same group has published a protocol for developing a study evaluating the degree of reproducibility and transparency of a representative sample of such economic assessments [5]. Finally, it is considered that the incorporation of economic studies in the development of clinical practice guidelines should contribute to reducing the variation in care practice, the amount of ineffective care and wasted on research and resources [6], thus improving health outcomes by encouraging the use of the most cost-efficient therapies [7]. However, such guidelines would not be appropriate, even if they followed the best standards for their development if we could not externally validate such studies, which would increase uncertainty about their results.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9uiv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfrfp","text":"References","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6325","text":"[1] Ioannidis JP, Greenland S, Hlatky MA, Khoury MJ, Macleod MR, Moher D, et al. Increasing value and reducing waste in research design, conduct, and analysis. Lancet. 2014; 383(9912):166–75.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7omrj","text":"[2] Williams I, McIver S, Moore D, Bryan S. The use of economic evaluations in NHS decision-making: a review and empirical investigation. Health Technol Assess. 2008 Apr;12(7):iii, ix-x, 1-175.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2trrv","text":"[3] Rennie D, Luft HS. Pharmacoeconomic analyses: making them transparent, making them credible. JAMA. 2000;283:2158–2160.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1htjg","text":"[4] Catalá-López F, Ridao M, Alonso-Arroyo A, et al. The quality of reporting methods and results of cost-effectiveness analyses in Spain: a methodological systematic review. Syst Rev. 2016;5:6. Published 2016 Jan 7.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47obm","text":"[5] Catalá-López F, Caulley L, Ridao M, et al. Reproducible research practices, openness and transparency in health economic evaluations: study protocol for cross-sectional comparative analysis. BMJ Open. 2020 Feb 13;10(2):e034463.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b218b","text":"[6]Alonso-Coello P, Irfan A, Solà I, et al. The quality of clinical practice guidelines over the last two decades: a systematic review of guideline appraisal studies. Qual Saf Health Care. 2010 Dec;19(6):e58.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f012s","text":"[7] Wallace JF, Weingarten SR, Chiou C-F, et al. The limited incorporation of economic analyses in clinical practice guidelines. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":90,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aba4f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cena1","text":"Search Strategy","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fo635","text":"These literature sources will be consulted.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21otj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"587dj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b4tld","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"41np0","text":"Eligibility","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ecpp4","text":"All GPCs developed in Spain from 2000 to 2020 containing at least one reference on the analysis of pharmacological interventions, regardless of age, gender, ethnicity/race,meta-analyses or pathology of the target population, will be included. For uniformity in the analysis, no guides limited to other approaches (preventive, diagnostic) will be included.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b75cs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6gvvm","text":"Data ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a75h6","text":"The descriptive data will be presented tabulated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ggjt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"docku","text":"Presentation of the results","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rko","text":"A diagram will be developed and the reporting checklist Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-Analyses (PRISMA) will be followed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":56,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cm7ek","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ugqn","text":"Reproducibility","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epi1c","text":"Both the R scripts and the primary data used in this job will be made public on the GitHub platform: https://github.com/info4cure/TFM_UPF_JR","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":17,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":101,"length":39}],"data":{}},{"key":"cdeh8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"D2F23D747EB311EBA5060A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://ssl.microsofttranslator.com/bv.aspx?ref=TVert\u0026from=\u0026to=en\u0026a=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.protocols.io%2F"}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[100,"482"],"data":[["CPG repositories","GuíaSalud"],["Search limiters","The free term 'Spain' and the publication filter '2000-2020' will be used as search limiters. "],["Context","Excluded: historical articles, abstracts of congresses, case reports, surveys, narrative reviews, narrative reports (i.e. those with a focus on understanding a concept), consensus documents, or meta-analysis performed without a systematic literature search. \n"]],"guid":"156166D07EB411EBA9B853FCB1636BBF","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["CPG repositories","GuíaSalud"],["Search limiters","The free term 'Spain' and the publication filter '2000-2020' will be used as search limiters.
